sentences.sContent: On the night the murder was committed , he was out of the country.
sentences.sCn: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.sContent: The man accused of her murder will appear in court today.
sentences.sCn: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.sContent: He was found guilty of attempted murder .
She was charged with two counts of first degree murder .
sentences.sCn: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.sContent: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.
sentences.sCn: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.sContent: Police are searching for the murder weapon .
Detectives have launched a murder investigation .
sentences.sCn: 警方探员已经启动凶杀案调查。

phrases.pCn: 大屠杀；大规模的谋杀；集体屠杀
可怕的谋杀；恐怖的喊声

words.tran: 杀人的，残忍的；凶残的；蓄意谋杀的

trans.tranOther: the crime of deliberately killing someone

trans.tranCn: 谋杀， 屠杀； 破坏
trans.tranOther: to kill someone deliberately and illegally
